Question
========

What is the correct description of the Odds Ratio in simple logistic regression? 
Answerlist
----------
* The change in the odds of *y* for one unit increase on *x*.
* The change in the odds of *x* for one unit increase on *y*.
* The ratio of the odds of *y*=1 and the odds of *y*=0.
* The ratio of the odds of *y*=0 and the odds of *y*=1.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
